Howdy, Phriends!
In case you missed it – there is a massive PHUSE Connect coming up soon in Austin, Texas! What’s so massive about it? There’s so much content planned that we’ve extended it by a full day! I guess it’s true what they say – Everything’s bigger in Texas!
One of the many expansions is the innovation of the four
PHUSE Pavilions
TM
to grab your interest:
Data Transparency (
agenda
)
Open Source (
agenda
)
Real-World Evidence (
agenda
)
Vulcan FHIR Forge (
agenda
)
And what’s the best part? They are all
FREE
with your Connect ticket! No additional fee. No additional registration. Thanks to our Pavilion Sponsors, all of this focused and expert-provided content is available to PHUSE attendees and included in your 2026 PHUSE US Connect registration.
And for those interested in
pharmaverse
, you’ll find contributors and Council members in the room for the Open Source Pavilion. Whether it’s facilitating a workshop on
Metadata-Driven Automation
, on the panel on
Open Source Change Management
, facilitating a workshop on
AI in Clinical Data Analysis,
or making connections at our novel
Open Source in Pharma Block Party
–
pharmaverse
will be present and engaged. And, this is just the Open Source Pavilion agenda – taking place over 2 of the 4 days and in just one of the 10 concurrent rooms of activity. That’s TEN – One-Zero – you know, like the ten-gallon hat?
So, saddle up and get ready! We ain’t horsin’ around this time. See you in Austin!
Michael Rimler, PHUSE Open Source Director

data.main_html:
Get Ready for the PHUSE US Connect Pavilions!

Posted on February 15, 2026 by Michael Rimler in R bloggers | 0 Comments

[This article was first published on pharmaverse blog, and kindly contributed to R-bloggers]. (You can report issue about the content on this page here)
Want to share your content on R-bloggers? click here if you have a blog, or here if you don't.

Howdy, Phriends!

In case you missed it – there is a massive PHUSE Connect coming up soon in Austin, Texas! What’s so massive about it? There’s so much content planned that we’ve extended it by a full day! I guess it’s true what they say – Everything’s bigger in Texas!

One of the many expansions is the innovation of the four PHUSE PavilionsTM to grab your interest:

  • Data Transparency (agenda)

  • Open Source (agenda)

  • Real-World Evidence (agenda)

  • Vulcan FHIR Forge (agenda)

And what’s the best part? They are all FREE with your Connect ticket! No additional fee. No additional registration. Thanks to our Pavilion Sponsors, all of this focused and expert-provided content is available to PHUSE attendees and included in your 2026 PHUSE US Connect registration.

And for those interested in pharmaverse, you’ll find contributors and Council members in the room for the Open Source Pavilion. Whether it’s facilitating a workshop on Metadata-Driven Automation, on the panel on Open Source Change Management, facilitating a workshop on AI in Clinical Data Analysis, or making connections at our novel Open Source in Pharma Block Party – pharmaverse will be present and engaged. And, this is just the Open Source Pavilion agenda – taking place over 2 of the 4 days and in just one of the 10 concurrent rooms of activity. That’s TEN – One-Zero – you know, like the ten-gallon hat?

So, saddle up and get ready! We ain’t horsin’ around this time. See you in Austin!

Michael Rimler, PHUSE Open Source Director

Last updated

2026-02-16 20:12:36.871922
